basics.name: Daniel Martins
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary:
Graduated from Universidade do Algarve in Electrical and Electronic Engineering since 2013 and subsequently completed my master's degree in 2016.
I intend to work on innovative and captivating projects that allow me to look at the work as a daily challenge.
I am interested in technology and the areas I like most are Electronics and Programming. In my free time i do some personal projects to enrich my knowlegde and try to invent something new.

work.name: Paycritical - Soluções de Pagamento, Lda
work.summary:
Worked on an innovative project for [WYD Lisbon 2023](https://www.lisboa2023.org/en) that allowed to the restaurants to redeem meals by reading pilgrims QR Codes.
Worked on [deGrazie](https://degrazie.com/en-US), a project that allows a user to read a QR Code for Order and Pay a meal in a restaurant.

work.name: Universidade do Algarve
work.summary:
SRM - Smart Revenue Management, QREN I&DT n.º 38962

Development of web crawlers to retrieve information in e-commerce websites for data warehouse purposes.

awards.title: Maker of Merit - Display(Matriz) de LEDs interativo
awards.summary: Merit recognition for the project "Display(Matriz) de LEDs interativo" presented in Lisbon Makers Faire 2015.

projects.name: Display(Matriz) de LEDs interativo
projects.description: A LED Display made to be exposed in 'Semana Académica do Algarve' over the bar tend of my course. Led Matrix features: React to sound beats (frequency), Show images, Play Simple Games, Write Messages.
